CareHandOff / xVenturesGroup

xVenturesGroup is a health-care marketing agency engaged in web application development.

xVenturesGroup needed a website to market-test interest in a health-care app under development.

Website Design

Craig Webb Art created a stylesheet and live prototype code based on the brand style developed earlier for HandOffLabs.com. The prototype was used for the website landing page and the styles were passed to a developer who incorporated them into the app.

User Experience

Craig Webb conducted a QA study of the CareHandOff.com app and wrote a user experience study to recommend style and function changes, flag flaws and suggest user enhancements for improvement.

Craig Webb created marketing graphics and live-code prototypes to convey styles to third-party developers.

Front-End Development

Static website using SASS, JavaScript and Bootstrap 3.
